name: Random Number Generator
description: Generates random numbers!

name: Word Frequency
description: Find the frequency of words in your text!

name: Word Finder Puzzle Generator
description: Generate word finder puzzles!

name: What If I Invested?
description: Explore the potential outcomes of your investments. See how much $1000 to NVIDIA in 2019 would be worth today!

name: Name the Countries
description: Test your geography knowledge by naming all the countries in the world!

name: Taylor Swift Song Guesser
description: Test your knowledge of Taylor Swift's discography by naming her songs!

name: Lana Del Rey Song Guesser
description: Test your knowledge of Lana Del Rey's discography by naming her songs!

name: Speech to Text
description: Convert your speech to text using your browser's speech recognition!

name: Magic 8 Ball
description: Ask the Magic 8 Ball a question and get your fortune told!

name: Image Editor
description: Edit your images with filters like brightness, contrast, saturation and more!

name: Consejos
description: Dichos y refranes que valen oro - Get wisdom from Spanish proverbs and sayings!

name: Thanksgiving Recipe
description: Plan your Thanksgiving meal with this interactive checklist of ingredients and supplies!

name: Simon Says
description: Test your memory and reflexes with this classic Simon Says game!

name: Lotería
description: Play the classic Mexican game of chance - match the cards and shout ¡Lotería!

name: Which Zodiac Sign Are You?
description: Answer a few questions to discover which zodiac sign matches your personality!

name: Choose Your Adventure
description: Embark on an interactive story where your choices determine the outcome!

name: Collatz Conjecture
description: Visualize the mysterious Collatz Conjecture sequence for any starting number!

name: Prime Factorization
description: Visualize the prime factorization of any number as a tree diagram!

name: Daily Budget
description: Calculate your daily budget based on salary and tax rate using the 50/30/20 rule

name: Word Guesser
description: Try to guess the 5-letter word in 6 tries with color-coded feedback!

name: Multiplication Practice
description: Practice your multiplication skills with randomly generated problems!

name: Sudoku Generator
description: Generate and solve Sudoku puzzles of varying difficulty levels!

name: JSON Beautifier
description: Format and beautify JSON data with proper indentation and syntax highlighting!

name: Text Diff Viewer
description: Compare two texts and see the differences highlighted!
